basics.name: Claudie Medders
basics.label: Architect
basics.summary: I am a driven programmer with a real enthusiasm for creating exemplary solutions to everyday and business problems. Through a range of roles in the industry I have developed a wide range of expertise. I take great pleasure watching an idea become a product and working alongside the people that make that happen.

references.reference: Claudie encyclopedic knowledge of network equipment is an incredibly useful resource. He always seems to have time to help and it was a genuine pleasure working with him.
references.name: Calandra Osuna

work.summary: Worked on a project to create ads inside mobile games. This project developed a range of promotional materials and with services for customers.
